getFrontend

public static FrontendManager getFrontend(Context ctx)
                                   throws IOException
Connect to defaultFrontend or the first frontend in the FrontendDB if defaultFrontend is null, returns quickly if the defaultFrontend if already connected

Parameters:
ctx - a Context
Returns:
A FrontendManager connected to a frontend or null if there's a problem
Throws:
IOException

getBackend

public static BackendManager getBackend()
                                 throws IOException
Connect to a backend. Connect to a specific backend if so configured or locate one otherwise returns quickly if a backend is already connected

Returns:
A BackendManager connected to a backend
Throws:
IOException - if we can't find or connect to a backend

setBackendTimezone

public static void setBackendTimezone(String zone)
Setup the global Date formatters with a given timezone, which would usually be obtained from the backend we're connected to

Parameters:
zone - String containing name of the timezone

haveServices

public static boolean haveServices()
Returns true if the backend supports the Services API

Returns:
true if the backend supports the Services API, false otherwise

runOnWorker

public static void runOnWorker(Runnable r)
Run a Runnable on the background worker thread Runnable's will be run consecutively in the order they are submitted

                                    int delay)
Schedule a Runnable to be run in the future on the worker thread

Parameters:
r - Runnable
delay - time in milliseconds before it will be run
